path: Boxes/Temple College Nursing Program/LVN Program/Fall 24/Advanced Nursing Skills/Documents/Registering for ChartFlow Instructions.pdf
text: Registering for ChartFlow Step 1: https://www.chartﬂow.io Step 2: Choose New Student Account Step 3: Enter your Temple College Email Step 4: Enter Course Code Step 5: Enter the Veriﬁcation Code sent to your TC email Step 6: Click Continue Step 7: Add Course Code if needed again by Clicking “+Course Code” Step 8: Message will appear that you have been added to the Course; Click “ok” Step 9: Choose “View Course” to enter medication administration practice charts
